flawed_nl_solution:
Jill watched one show that was 4 times longer than 30 minutes, so it was 4*30=<<4*30=120>>120 minutes long.
Jill also watched another show that was 30 minutes long, so the total time Jill spent was 120+30=<<120+30=510>>510 minutes
#### 510

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 150, not 510. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
